description: Touch a willing creature. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. Until the spell ends, the creature can use an action to exhale energy of the chosen type in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity save, taking 3d6 damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.
higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2nd.
name: Dragon's Breath
